actions.recommendation: Exercise moderately and improve your diet by eating 5 fresh fruit & veg daily, eat more fish. Avoid sugary & fatty foods. Aim to bring down your weight and waist circumference. This will decrease the risk of hypertension, diabetes, stokes and help to bring down the cholesterol.

Your BMI and your waist to height ratio is high and this increases the risk of lifestyle diseases like hypertension and diabetes. Aim for a waist to height ratio of less than 50 and a BMI less than 50 to decrease your risk.
Please repeat the lung function test & hsCRP. Repeat cholesterol in 3 months time.
Speak to your GP/ICAS/psychologist for the anxiety you have been feeling.
